# Wave of Pain (Spell)
## Overview
[[Necromancy Spells|Necromancy]] \[[[Evil Spells|evil]]]

**Level:** [[6th Level Bard Spells|Bard 6]], [[Pain (Domain)|Pain 7]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 11th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 11]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** S, M (a needle)

**Range:** Close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels)

**Area:** Cone

**Duration:** 1 round/2 levels

**Saving Throw:** Fortitude negates

**Spell Resistance:** Yes

**Source:** Book of Vile Darkness (WotC)Â­, pg. 109

All living creatures within the cone are overcome with pain and suffering. They are [[Stunned|stunned]] for the duration of the spell. A creature with no discernible anatomy is unaffected by this spell.
